snippet: For both contenders in the presidential race, winning over the small group of undecided voters seems less important than appealing to the base.
abstract: Political Memo on Mitt Romney's selection of Rep Paul D Ryan as his running mate, which has energized the Republican Party’s base and brought fresh enthusiasm and bigger crowds to the Romney campaign; choice is evidence of a subtle but broad strategic shift by Romney toward a focus on energizing an anti-Obama campaign that many Congressional Republicans are concerned could divert attention from core issues.
lead_paragraph: For both contenders in the presidential race, winning over the small group of undecided voters seems less important than appealing to the base.

headline.seo: Ryan Pick Shifts Focus From Economy to Ideology
headline.main: Choice of Paul Ryan Shifts the Focus From Economy to Ideology
headline.print_headline: Choice of Ryan Shifts the Focus From Economy
